title: Cannot reconnect to game after crash
body:
So, my game crashed about 7 minutes in. I restarted the client and it shows the button to reconnect. I push it, nothing happens. I have restarted computer and restarted client many times, still doing the same thing. It also shows I'm in game. I have ruined a game for 9 other people and it's not even something I did. I don't want to get reported for a client crash and then it not allowing me back into game.

**UPDATE** It allowed me to reconnect in the post game lobby. I don't understand....
***Update 2*** I attempted to make a bot game so that this wouldn't happen again. It was literally a custom with just me vs. a bot. I pick my champion, begin to load, then it crashes and does the same thing as previously stated. I have checked firewall and antivirus, nothing is blocking this. Please please help

replies.body: It really sounds like something is blocking your access to our servers, but only the actual game servers and not the client or lobby. Try updating your port forwarding with [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq8) to be sure those aren't closed, but also try running a clean boot to make sure nothing else is getting in the way.
The exact same thing happened with me, trying to reinstall right now.
